name: Yoyo's Great Adventure
description: In Yoyo's Great Adventure you play Yoyo, a little funny creature who has lived happily and peacefully in a magic land. One day without an apparent reason everything changes, evil magic fills the air and poor Yoyo is struck with a magical lightning. The lightning works as some kind of teleport between realities and dimensions and Yoyo wakes up in an ancient Poland. The gameplay is reminiscent of the Dizzy games.
